submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        colors.extend(colors[:k-1])
        print(colors)
        left = 0
        right = 0
        total = 0
        while right < len(colors):
            if right - left+1 < k:
                # need more items in our group
                didMove = False
                while right+1 < len(colors) and colors[right+1] == colors[right]:
                    # not alternating
                    # so keep moving right forward
                    right += 1
                    didMove = True
                if not didMove:
                    # no change was needed because alternating
                    right += 1
                else:
                    # there was a contiguous group
                    # so move left up
                    left = right
                    right = right + 1
            else:
                # print('incrementing at', left, right)
                total += 1
                left += 1 

        return total
